thread.title: Very efficient and well laid out Novotel, 5mins from Hammersmith tube
thread.title_full: Very efficient and well laid out Novotel, 5mins from Hammersmith tube - Review of Novotel London West, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Dave L
title: Very efficient and well laid out Novotel, 5mins from Hammersmith tube
text: An excellent hotel 5mins walk from the Hammersmith tube station. Efficient check especially liked the online function which meant the room key was ready when i arrived (look for the dedicated person on the front desk if there is a queue at all). Good atmosphere in the bar area, arrived too late for food. Breakfast was excellent and well organised and good coffee. Speedy check another good point. I used the business area during the morning which was a quiet area for meetings with a good tea/coffee service. An excellent Novotel!
